so, <cit><quote lang="la">studia (opp. forum),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:6:4" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 12, 6, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">disputationes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:2:7" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 12, 2, 7</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">contentio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:7:9:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 7, 9, 4</bibl></cit> et saep. —Hence, </sense><sense id="n43221.12" n="b" level="4"> <hi rend="ital">Subst.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">sēcrētum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, <hi rend="ital">retirement</hi>, <hi rend="ital">solitude</hi>, <hi rend="ital">secrecy; a solitude</hi>, <hi rend="ital">solitary place</hi>, <hi rend="ital">retreat</hi> (syn.: solitudo, secessus); <number>sing.</number>: <cit><quote lang="la">cum stilus secreto gaudeat atque omnes arbitros reformidet,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:10:7:16" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 10, 7, 16</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">secreti longi causā,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:21:21" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> H. 21, 21</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">altum abditumque secretum, Phn. Ep. 2, 17, 22: dulce,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:3:1:6" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 3, 1, 6</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:10:3:30" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 10, 3, 30</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:5:2" default="NO">12, 5, 2</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:4:57" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 4, 57</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">14, 53</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,001:39" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Agr. 39 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0975,001:3:10:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Phaedr.</author> 3, 10, 11</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0975,001:4:23:6" default="NO" valid="yes">4, 23, 6</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:3:314" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 3, 314</bibl>.— <hi rend="ital">Plur.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">se a vulgo et scaenā in secreta removere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:2:1:71" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 2, 1, 71</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">horrendaeque procul secreta Sibyllae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:6:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 6, 10</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:1:594" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 1, 594</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:3:63" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 3, 63</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:2:18" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 2, 18</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">dulcis secretorum comes (eloquentia),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:4:5" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 1, 4, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cameli solitudines aut secreta certe petunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:10:173" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 10, 63, 83, § 173</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">haec pars Suevorum in secretiora Germaniae porrigitur,</quote> <trans><tr>into the more remote parts</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,002:41" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> G. 41</bibl></cit>. —</sense><sense id="n43221.13" n="(b)" level="5"> <usg type="style"><hi rend="ital">Absol.</hi></usg>: in secreto, <hi rend="ital">in a secret place</hi>, <hi rend="ital">secretly</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">tempus in secreto lbi tereret,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:26:19:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 26, 19, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">reus in secreto agebatur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:10:4:29" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 10, 4, 29</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n43221.14" n="2" level="3"> That is removed from acquaintance (cf. abditus), <hi rend="ital">hidden</hi>, <hi rend="ital">concealed</hi>, <hi rend="ital">secret</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">secreta ducis pectora,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1294,001:5:5:4" default="NO"><author>Mart.</author> 5, 5, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">secretas advocat artes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:7:138" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 7, 138</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ars,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">litterae (with familiares),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:1:29" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 1, 29</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">carmina (the Sibylline odes),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:1:599" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 1, 599</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">libidines,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:1:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 1, 4 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quaedam imperii pignora,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1242,001:1:2:3" default="NO"><author>Flor.</author> 1, 2, 3</bibl></cit>.—With <hi rend="ital">ab</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">nec quicquam secretum alter ab altero haberent,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:39:10:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 39, 10, 1</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">libertus ex secretioribus ministeriis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,001:40" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> Agr. 40</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">praemia (opp. publica largitio),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:1:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> H. 1, 24</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aliud (nomen),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:4:25" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 4, 25</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">vitium stomachi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1294,001:3:77:9" default="NO"><author>Mart.</author> 3, 77, 9</bibl></cit>.—<usg type="style">Poet.</usg> for the <pos>adv.</pos> secreto: <cit><quote lang="la">tu (Anna) secreta pyram tecto interiore Erige,</quote> <trans><tr>in secret</tr>, <tr>secretly</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:4:494" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 4, 494</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">stridere secreta divisos aure susurros,</quote> <trans><tr>secretly in each one's ear</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:2:8:78" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 2, 8, 78</bibl></cit>.—Hence, </sense><sense id="n43221.15" n="b" level="4"> <hi rend="ital">Subst.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">sēcrētum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, <hi rend="ital">something secret</hi>, <hi rend="ital">secret conversation; a mystery</hi>, <hi rend="ital">secret</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">secretum petenti non nisi adhibito filio dedit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=tib.:25" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Tib. 25 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cal.:23" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Calig. 23</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">illuc me persecutus secretum petit,</quote> <trans><tr>a secret interview</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:1:5:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 1, 5, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">petito secreto futura aperit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:2:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 2, 4</bibl></cit>.— <hi rend="ital">Piur.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">crebra cum amicis secreta habere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:13:18" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 13, 18</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">animi secreta proferuntur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:14:141" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 14, 22, 28, § 141</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nulla lex jubet amicorum secreta non eloqui,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ben. 5:21:1" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ben. 5, 21, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">omnium secreta rimari,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:6:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 6, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">horribile secretum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 21, 3</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:1:17" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 1, 17</bibl> <cb n="SECE" /> <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,001:25" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Agr. 25</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:66" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 66</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">uxor omnis secreti capacissima,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:1:12:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 1, 12, 7</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:9:5 al" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 12, 9, 5 al.</bibl>—Concr.: <cit><quote lang="la">lucos ac nemora consecrant deorumque nominibus appellant secretum illud, quod solā reverentiā vident,</quote> <trans><tr>that mysterious being</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,002:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> G. 9</bibl></cit> <hi rend="ital">fin.—Plur.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">introitus, aperta, secreta velut in annales referebat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:4:67" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 4, 67</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">gens non astuta aperit adhuc secreta pectoris licentia joci,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,002:22" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> G. 22</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">oratio animi secreta detegit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:11:1:30" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 11, 1, 30</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:1:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 1, 6</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">4, 7</bibl> <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi>; 6, 3; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,002:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> G. 19</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,002:68:6" default="NO"><author>Plin.</author> Pan. 68, 6</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=tib.:52" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Tib. 52</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=otho:3" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Oth. 3</bibl> et saep.—Concr.: <cit><quote lang="la">(Minerva) hanc legem dederat, sua ne secreta viderent,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>the mysteries</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:2:556" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 2, 556</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">2, 749</bibl>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">secretiora quaedam,</quote> <trans><tr>magic arts</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 14, 6, 14</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in secretis ejus reperti sunt duo libelli,</quote> <trans><tr>among his private papers</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cal.:49" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Calig. 49</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n43221.16" n="3" level="3"> Pregn., separate from what is common, i. e. <hi rend="ital">uncommon</hi>, <hi rend="ital">rare</hi>, <hi rend="ital">recondite</hi> (perh. only in the two foll. passages of Quint.): <cit><quote lang="la">(figurae) secretae et extra vulgarem usum positae, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:3:5" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 9, 3, 5</bibl></cit>: interpretatio linguae secretioris, quas Graeci <foreign lang="greek">glw/ssas</foreign> vocant, i. e. <hi rend="ital">of the more uncommon words</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:1:35" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 1, 1, 35</bibl> (for which: <cit><quote lang="la">glossemata id est voces minus usitatas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:8:15" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 1, 8, 15</bibl></cit>).—</sense><sense id="n43221.17" n="4" level="3"> In Lucr., of any thing separated from what belongs to it, i. e. <hi rend="ital">wanting</hi>, <hi rend="ital">deprived of</hi>, <hi rend="ital">without something;</hi> with <case>abl.</case> or <hi rend="ital">gen.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">nec porro secreta cibo natura animantum Propagare genus possit (corresp. to sine imbribus),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:1:194" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 1, 194</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">(corpora) secreta teporis Sunt ac frigoris omnino calidique vaporis (corresp. to spoliata colore),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:2:843" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 2, 843</bibl></cit>. —Hence, <pos>adv.</pos>, in three forms: secreto (class.), secrete (post-class.), and secretim (late Lat. and very rare). * </sense><sense id="n43221.18" n="1" level="3"> (Acc. to A.) <hi rend="ital">Apart</hi>, <hi rend="ital">by itself</hi>, <hi rend="ital">separately</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">de quibus (hortis) suo loco dicam secretius,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:11:2:25" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 11, 2, 25</bibl></cit>. —</sense><sense id="n43221.19" n="2" level="3"> (Acc. to B. 2.) <hi rend="ital">In secret</hi>, <hi rend="ital">secretly; without witnesses; in private.</hi> </sense><sense id="n43221.20" n="(a)" level="5"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">sēcrē-tō</orth>: <cit><quote lang="la">mirum, quid solus secum secreto ille agat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,001:3:2:73" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Am. 3, 2, 73</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">secreto illum adjutabo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,020:2:7:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Truc. 2, 7, 7</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">secreto hoc audi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:7:25:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 7, 25, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nescio quid secreto velle loqui te Aiebas mecum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:1:9:67" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> S. 1, 9, 67</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">secreto te huc seduxi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,003:2:1:14" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Aul. 2, 1, 14</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">facere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,004:5:2:30" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Bacch. 5, 2, 30</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">5, 2, 35</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,005:4:45:section=100" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Verr. 2, 4, 45, § 100</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:7:8:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Att. 7, 8, 4</bibl>; Cael. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:8:1:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 8, 1, 4</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">secreto ab aliis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:36" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 1, 31, 1</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:5:13:16" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 5, 13, 16</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:2:79" default="NO">9, 2, 79</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:3:20:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 3, 20, 8</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:7:2:13" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 7, 2, 13</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n43221.21" n="(b)" level="5"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">sēcrētē</orth>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Or. 1 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Pall. 4 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>—</sense><sense id="n43221.22" n="b" level="4"> <hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">secretius emittitur inflatio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Q.
